movie.title: Doses of Horror
movie.description_intro: At an asylum, patients were subjected to watching horror films for psychiatric study. They all went mad and now those films have been unearthed.
movie.description_full: At an asylum, patients were subjected to watching horror films for psychiatric study. They all went mad and now those films have been unearthed.

movies.title: Noctem
movies.summary: Adrian and Esteban have been missing for a year, with only their belongings found in Cozumel near the Riviera Maya. The police are at a standstill, but their friend Alex starts his own investigation using their cellphones...and discovers that the truth is more terrifying than he could ever imagine.
movies.description_full: Adrian and Esteban have been missing for a year, with only their belongings found in Cozumel near the Riviera Maya. The police are at a standstill, but their friend Alex starts his own investigation using their cellphones...and discovers that the truth is more terrifying than he could ever imagine.

movies.title: River of Darkness
movies.summary: When brutal murdering starts in a small riverside town, the sheriff must investigate and face the horrific past.
movies.description_full: When brutal murdering starts in a small riverside town, the sheriff must investigate and face the horrific past.
movies.synopsis: When brutal murdering starts in a small riverside town, the sheriff must investigate and face the horrific past.

movies.title: Happy Birthday Hannah
movies.summary: Rachel has lived for years with the guilt of accidentally let her younger sister Hannah drown when they were children. But sometimes guilt is not enough. Now, on Hannah's birthday, the ghost of the dead girl returns to haunt and torment her older sister.
movies.description_full: Rachel has lived for years with the guilt of accidentally let her younger sister Hannah drown when they were children. But sometimes guilt is not enough. Now, on Hannah's birthday, the ghost of the dead girl returns to haunt and torment her older sister.

movies.title: The First Power
movies.summary: A killer is given the gas chamber after committing several demonic murders. His spirit is released and given power by the Devil. Now the cop that caught him before must find a way to do it again.
movies.description_full: A killer is given the gas chamber after committing several demonic murders. His spirit is released and given power by the Devil. Now the cop that caught him before must find a way to do it again.
